Question
========

Als *A* = {4,5,6,8} en *B* = {3,5,7,8}, wat is dan de vereniging van *A*
en *B*?

Answerlist
----------

* A ∪ B = ∅
* A ∪ B = {3,4,5,6,7,8}
* A ∪ B = {3,4,5,6,8}
* A ∪ B = {4,5,6,7,8}

Solution
========

Het correcte antwoord is: 

* A ∪ B = {3,4,5,6,7,8}
